titleStmt.title: Letter of fishermen to a strategos
titleStmt.author: Faustos, son of Kephalon and Tauris, Amois, son of Kallios and Herais and O[ ], son of NN and Didyme

revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: To Asklepiades, strategos. Faustos, son of Kephalon, grandson of Demetrios, his mother being Tauris and Amois, son of Kallios, grandson of [ ] his mother being Herais and O[ ], son of [ ], his mother being Didyme, the three from Oxyrhynchon polis, seine fishermen of the village of ... (selected) by their fellow seine fishermen of the same village, invoke Imperator Caesar Traianus Hadrianus Augustus ...

listBibl.bibl: Westermann WL - Kraemer CJ, PCorn, 46, 1926, Pl p225 -- BL II 2, 50; VII, 41
